title: Lady Igraine
description: Emelina Grace has just graduated high school and is looking for her next great adventure. After moving to a small town, just outside of Los Angeles, to live with her grandmother, Emelina stumbles upon a family antique allowing her to travel back in time to Medieval England to re-live the life of her ancestor, Lady Igraine. During her travels, Emelina learns the truth about the secret life as a royal, the scandals surrounding Queen Guinevere and Sir Lancelot, and discovers that what most know about King Arthur and his knights of the round table, might be quite inaccurate.
author: Bethany Wray
